stopDtmfTone().Description: Stops the most recent request to play a DTMF tone.

getExtras().Description: Obtain the extras associated with this RemoteConnection.

separate(android.telecom.RemoteConnectio.Description: Removes the specified @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@ from the conference. This causes the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@ to become a standalone connection. This is a no-op if the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@ does not belong to this conference.

Returns: A constant representing the state the conference call is currently in.
getState().Description: Gets the state of the conference call. See @B_android#telecom#Connection_E@ for valid values.

Parameters: RemoteConference.Callback: The callback to notify of state changes.
Handler: The handler on which to execute the callbacks.
registerCallback(android.telecom.RemoteC.Description: Registers a callback through which to receive state updates for this conference. Callbacks will be notified using the specified handler, if provided.
registerCallback(android.telecom.RemoteC.FullName: public void registerCallback (RemoteConference.Callback callback, Handler handler)

getConferenceableConnections().Description: Returns a list of independent connections that can me merged with this conference.

disconnect().Description: Disconnects the conference call as well as the child @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@s.

getConnections().Description: Returns the list of @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@s contained in this conference.

Returns: A bitmask of the properties of the conference call.
getConnectionProperties().Description: Returns the properties of the conference. See PROPERTY_* constants in class @B_android#telecom#Connection_E@ for valid values.

merge().Description: Merges all @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@s of this conference into a single call. This should be invoked only if the conference contains the capability @B_android#telecom#Connection#CAPABILITY_MERGE_CONFERENCE_E@, otherwise it is a no-op. The presence of said capability indicates that the connections of this conference, despite being part of the same conference object, are yet to have their audio streams merged; this is a common pattern for CDMA conference calls, but the capability is not used for GSM and SIP conference calls. Invoking this method will cause the unmerged child connections to merge their audio streams.

getDisconnectCause().Description: Returns the @B_android#telecom#DisconnectCause_E@ for the conference if it is in the state @B_android#telecom#Connection#STATE_DISCONNECTED_E@. If the conference is not disconnected, this will return null.

Returns: A bitmask of the capabilities of the conference call.
getConnectionCapabilities().Description: Returns the capabilities of the conference. See CAPABILITY_* constants in class @B_android#telecom#Connection_E@ for valid values.

swap().Description: Swaps the active audio stream between the conference's child @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@s. This should be invoked only if the conference contains the capability @B_android#telecom#Connection#CAPABILITY_SWAP_CONFERENCE_E@, otherwise it is a no-op. This is only used by @B_android#telecom#ConnectionService_E@s that create conferences for connections that do not yet have their audio streams merged; this is a common pattern for CDMA conference calls, but the capability is not used for GSM and SIP conference calls. Invoking this method will change the active audio stream to a different child connection.

Parameters: char: The digit for which to play a DTMF tone.
playDtmfTone(char).Description: Requests that the conference start playing the specified DTMF tone.

setCallAudioState(android.telecom.CallAu.Description: Request to change the conference's audio routing to the specified state. The specified state can include audio routing (Bluetooth, Speaker, etc) and muting state.

Parameters: RemoteConference.Callback: The callback to notify of state changes.
registerCallback(android.telecom.RemoteC.Description: Register a callback through which to receive state updates for this conference.

ClassDesc: A conference provided to a @B_android#telecom#ConnectionService_E@ by another ConnectionService through @B_android#telecom#ConnectionService#conferenceRemoteConnections_E@. Once created, a RemoteConference can be used to control the conference call or monitor changes through @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#Callback_E@.
